email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Coal from Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope this email finds you well. We are pleased to offer a freight rate for the shipment of 12,000MT of coal from Newcastle to Yokohama on CIF terms. The vessel we propose is the OCEAN HORIZON, with a DWT of 85,000 and LOA of 230m. The laycan is set for 15th to 20th November, and the initial freight quote is USD 25 per MT.

Please let us know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal from Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the offer. Given the current market conditions, we were hoping for a more competitive rate. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 23 per MT?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day and any potential delays?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
Emily Carter
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal from Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 24 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 15,000 per day.

Please note that the laycan remains 15th to 20th November, and there are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal from Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 24 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
Emily Carter
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal from Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Newcastle on 15th November, with a 24-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal from Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
Emily Carter
Global Charterers
